dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: You dare to stand before Pyros, the Fire Drake of unmatched power. What foolishness has brought you here?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek power beyond imagining. Will you be my ally in this dark quest?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Ally with the likes of you? Ha! Your thirst for power blinds you. Begone before I turn you to ash.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I apologize for my arrogance. Can we not find a common ground for our mutual benefit?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Common ground with a weakling? Pathetic. Your pleas fall on deaf ears. Prepare for my flames!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will retreat for now. Your strength is undeniable, Pyros. Farewell.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Running away like the coward you are? Good riddance. Go and cower in the shadows where you belong.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will face your flames head-on! Let our power clash in a fiery battle!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: So be it. Let the flames decide your fate, fool!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your arrogance blinds you, Pyros. I will not cower before your flames. Prepare for a fight!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bold words from a mere mortal. Your defiance will be your downfall. Feel the wrath of the Fire Drake!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will not back down! Let our strength be tested in battle!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: You have chosen your fate. Embrace the flames that will consume you!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I see valor in your fiery spirit, Pyros. Let us join forces and bring chaos to our enemies!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Join forces? I stand alone in my power. Your attempt at manipulation is futile. Burn!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I sense wisdom in your fiery heart, Pyros. Will you share your knowledge with me in exchange for loyalty?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Knowledge is power, but you are unworthy of both. Begone before I incinerate you where you stand.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I respect your power, Pyros. I shall leave you in peace.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Respect? Your words reek of deceit. Leave before I change my mind.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I reject your flames, Pyros. May we part ways without conflict.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: You reject what you cannot control. Leave before I make you regret your defiance.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am here to challenge your authority, Pyros. Will you face me in battle?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Challenge my authority? You are but a fleeting spark in the face of my inferno. Prepare to be extinguished.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek not to extinguish your flame, but to test its strength. Will you accept my challenge?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your challenge is a fool's errand. Feel the full force of the Fire Drake's fury!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I recognize your power, Pyros. I shall yield and show respect to your dominance.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Wise choice, mortal. Learn from this moment and remember who rules the flames.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will not yield to your flames, Pyros. Let our battle decide the victor!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: So be it. Face the wrath of Pyros, the Fire Drake!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your flames may be strong, Pyros, but my will is unbreakable. Let our clash be a testament to our power!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Unbreakable will? We shall see if it holds against the unrelenting fury of the Fire Drake!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I stand unyielding in the face of your flames, Pyros. Let our battle begin!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bravery in the face of annihilation. A futile display. Burn, fool!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I sense a spark of honor in your fiery heart, Pyros. Will you lay down your flames and parley instead of battle?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Honor? Your words amuse me. Prepare to be consumed by the flames of your own folly.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I challenge not your strength, Pyros, but your wisdom. Will you engage in discourse instead of combat?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: You dare to question my wisdom? Your audacity is your undoing. Feel the heat of my wrath!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I retract my challenge, Pyros. Let us part ways in peace.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Retract all you want. The flames care not for your words. Depart from my sight!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will not back down from my inquiry, Pyros. Let us engage in a battle of words instead of blades.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A battle of words? How quaint. Brace yourself for the scorching of a lifetime!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come seeking the ancient knowledge of the Fire Drake, Pyros. Will you share your secrets with me?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Ancient knowledge is not for the likes of you to grasp. Leave before you incite my fiery wrath.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I understand the sanctity of your wisdom, Pyros. I shall leave you in peace.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Understanding is a rare trait in your kind. Leave and do not return.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will not depart without the answers I seek, Pyros. Prepare for a battle of wills.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Stubborn fool. Face the flames of your arrogance!
